meta.description: Personality test question banks for freshblogs.cc interactive tools

tests.title: What's Your True Zodiac Personality Type?
What Is Your Cosmic Love Style?
What Is Your Spirit Animal?
What Is Your Dominant Energy Type?
Which Planet Rules Your Life?
What Past Life Archetype Do You Carry?
Which Chakra Needs Your Attention?
What Is Your Manifestation Style?
What Is Your Cosmic Attachment Style?
What Is Your Cosmic Purpose?
What's Your True Zodiac Personality Type?
tests.description: Beyond your sun sign — discover which zodiac archetype truly drives your personality. 15 questions reveal your cosmic blueprint.

questions.text: When you walk into a party where you know almost no one, you:

options.text: Immediately start introducing yourself to everyone
Find a small group and join an interesting conversation
Stick close to the person who brought you
Observe the room first, then selectively engage

questions.text: Your biggest strength in relationships is:

options.text: Passion and excitement — you keep things alive
Loyalty and dependability — you're always there
Communication and adaptability
Depth and emotional intelligence

questions.text: When you face a major life decision, you primarily:

options.text: Trust your gut and act decisively
Carefully analyze all information before deciding
Consult people you trust and weigh perspectives
Follow your intuition and sense of deeper meaning

questions.text: Your ideal weekend looks like:

options.text: Adventure, travel, or trying something completely new
A cozy, comfortable day at home with loved ones
Social events — dinner parties, concerts, seeing friends
Productive alone time — projects, research, creating

questions.text: What do people most admire about you?

options.text: Your confidence and ability to lead
Your kindness and emotional support
Your intelligence and unique perspective
Your depth and mysterious intensity

questions.text: When someone wrongs you, you are most likely to:

options.text: Confront them directly and immediately
Process it internally for a long time before deciding
Try to understand their perspective and forgive
Quietly distance yourself and move on

questions.text: Your relationship with money and material things is:

options.text: You spend freely on experiences and enjoyment
You value security and save carefully
Money matters less than meaning and connection
You manage it strategically as a tool for power

questions.text: In group projects, you naturally become:

options.text: The leader who sets the vision and direction
The organizer who ensures everything gets done properly
The connector who keeps the team's energy positive
The creative mind who brings unexpected solutions

questions.text: Your inner world is best described as:

options.text: Bold visions and ambitious dreams constantly forming
Deep emotional currents and complex feelings
Practical plans and realistic assessments
Ideas, connections, and intellectual explorations

questions.text: When you're stressed, you tend to:

options.text: Become restless, impulsive, or aggressive
Retreat inward and become guarded or withdrawn
Overthink and analyze everything obsessively
Escape through fantasy, spirituality, or creativity

questions.text: Your approach to change is:

options.text: Bring it on — you thrive in new situations
Resist it initially, but adapt when necessary
Embrace it intellectually even if emotionally unsettled
Transform through change — it's your natural element

questions.text: Love, for you, is primarily about:

options.text: Passion, intensity, and magnetic attraction
Security, loyalty, and building a life together
Partnership, balance, and mutual growth
Spiritual connection and unconditional acceptance

questions.text: Others would describe your sense of humor as:

options.text: Bold, irreverent, and sometimes shocking
Dry, subtle, and deeply clever
Quick-witted and playfully teasing
Absurdist, imaginative, and uniquely their own

questions.text: Your greatest fear is:

options.text: Being controlled or losing your freedom
Losing security, stability, or the people you love
Being ordinary, ignored, or failing publicly
Betrayal, powerlessness, or hidden deception

questions.text: At your core, you are driven by:

options.text: Achievement, recognition, and leaving a legacy
Connection, belonging, and emotional nourishment
Understanding, knowledge, and mental stimulation
Transformation, truth, and the depths of experience

Aries.title: The Cosmic Pioneer — Aries Archetype
Aries.description: You lead with fire, instinct, and unmatched courage. The Aries archetype drives you toward new beginnings, bold action, and authentic self-expression. You are at your best when pioneering new territory.
Aries.growth_tip: Channel your fire with patience — the greatest victories require sustained effort, not just explosive starts.

Taurus.title: The Cosmic Builder — Taurus Archetype
Taurus.description: You build things that last — relationships, resources, and beauty. The Taurus archetype grounds you in sensory richness, loyalty, and the patient accumulation of what truly matters.
Taurus.growth_tip: Your strength is also your challenge — practice embracing necessary change before being forced into it.

Gemini.title: The Cosmic Communicator — Gemini Archetype
Gemini.description: Your mind moves like quicksilver — collecting, connecting, and communicating ideas with dazzling speed. The Gemini archetype keeps you eternally curious, adaptable, and intellectually alive.
Gemini.growth_tip: Depth rewards the curious mind — choose your most important pursuits and commit to mastering them.

Cancer.title: The Cosmic Nurturer — Cancer Archetype
Cancer.description: Your emotional intelligence and capacity for love are extraordinary gifts. The Cancer archetype makes you the heart of every relationship and the keeper of emotional memory.
Cancer.growth_tip: Your gifts flourish when you nurture yourself as generously as you nurture others.

Leo.title: The Cosmic Creator — Leo Archetype
Leo.description: You were born to shine. The Leo archetype fills you with creative fire, generous heart, and a natural authority that draws others toward your warmth.
Leo.growth_tip: True leadership serves others first — let your warmth and generosity lead, and your authority will follow naturally.

Virgo.title: The Cosmic Analyst — Virgo Archetype
Virgo.description: You see what others miss and improve what others accept. The Virgo archetype drives you toward mastery, service, and the pursuit of genuine excellence.
Virgo.growth_tip: Excellence is worthy; perfectionism is exhausting. Practice recognizing when good enough is genuinely excellent.

Libra.title: The Cosmic Harmonizer — Libra Archetype
Libra.description: You carry an innate sense of beauty, fairness, and the art of relationship. The Libra archetype makes you a natural diplomat and champion of justice.
Libra.growth_tip: Your greatest power comes from decisive action — practice choosing without needing everyone's approval.

Scorpio.title: The Cosmic Transformer — Scorpio Archetype
Scorpio.description: You go where others dare not — into depth, truth, and the transformative power of the shadow. The Scorpio archetype makes you extraordinary at psychological insight and regeneration.
Scorpio.growth_tip: Release the need to hold everything tightly — your deepest power comes through surrender and trust.

Sagittarius.title: The Cosmic Adventurer — Sagittarius Archetype
Sagittarius.description: You are the eternal seeker — of truth, experience, and the meaning at the horizon. The Sagittarius archetype fills you with optimism, philosophical hunger, and irrepressible enthusiasm.
Sagittarius.growth_tip: The greatest wisdom integrates depth with breadth — choose some pursuits to follow all the way to mastery.

Capricorn.title: The Cosmic Achiever — Capricorn Archetype
Capricorn.description: You build with time as your ally. The Capricorn archetype gives you strategic vision, iron discipline, and the rare ability to build lasting structures — in career, relationships, and character.
Capricorn.growth_tip: Achievement without joy is hollow — build rest, play, and emotional nourishment into your path to the top.

Aquarius.title: The Cosmic Visionary — Aquarius Archetype
Aquarius.description: You see the future from the present. The Aquarius archetype gives you humanitarian vision, radical independence, and a mind that operates beyond conventional limits.
Aquarius.growth_tip: Your visions need human roots — practice vulnerability and emotional connection to bring others fully into your world.

Pisces.title: The Cosmic Dreamer — Pisces Archetype
Pisces.description: You feel everything and imagine more. The Pisces archetype gives you extraordinary empathy, artistic sensitivity, and access to the spiritual dimensions of experience.
Pisces.growth_tip: Your sensitivity is a superpower that needs boundaries — practice directing your gifts with discernment.

tests.title: What Is Your Cosmic Love Style?
tests.description: How do you love and how do you want to be loved? Discover your astrological love language in 12 questions.

questions.text: The best moment in a relationship is when:

options.text: You share a deep, hours-long conversation about life
You're physically close — holding hands, cuddling, touching
Your partner does something thoughtful without being asked
They tell you exactly how they feel about you

questions.text: After a hard day, you most want your partner to:

options.text: Hold you without needing to talk
Listen and let you process out loud
Take care of practical things to lighten your load
Do something special to make you feel celebrated

questions.text: You feel most loved when your partner:

options.text: Says 'I love you' or gives meaningful compliments often
Spends dedicated, uninterrupted time with you
Touches your arm, takes your hand, or gives hugs spontaneously
Remembers details and surprises you with small thoughtful gestures

questions.text: In a long-term relationship, what matters most?

options.text: Intellectual stimulation — growing together mentally
Emotional depth — knowing each other fully
Stability and building a shared life
Passion and continued desire

questions.text: Your biggest pet peeve in relationships:

options.text: Partner who doesn't communicate or express feelings
Partner who is too clingy or emotionally demanding
Partner who doesn't show up — physically or emotionally
Partner who takes without giving back

questions.text: The most romantic date for you would be:

options.text: A spontaneous adventure — surprise destination, just go!
Cooking together at home followed by deep conversation
A thoughtfully planned evening with meaningful details
A beautiful, sensory experience — fine dining, spa, nature

questions.text: When you argue with a partner, you tend to:

options.text: State your case clearly and expect resolution quickly
Need time and space to process before talking
Get swept up in emotion and need to feel heard first
Stay rational, analyze the issue, find compromise

questions.text: In relationships, you are most naturally:

options.text: The one who initiates plans, affection, and intensity
The steady, dependable foundation
The emotionally attuned, deeply caring partner
The intellectually stimulating, freedom-respecting partner

questions.text: You show love primarily by:

options.text: Doing things — making their life easier
Saying things — expressing feelings verbally
Touching — physical presence and affection
Giving — thoughtful gifts and meaningful surprises

questions.text: Your idea of commitment is:

options.text: Choosing someone new every day — it's a daily decision
Building something permanent and unshakeable together
A deep soul bond that transcends the ordinary
Freedom within togetherness — space and connection both

questions.text: What makes you feel truly seen by a partner?

options.text: They remember what you said months ago and bring it up
They notice when something is wrong without you saying anything
They challenge and respect your intelligence
They show up consistently, no matter what

questions.text: Love, at its deepest, is:

options.text: A transformative force that changes who you are
A safe harbor — acceptance and belonging
An adventure shared with your greatest companion
A meeting of minds as much as hearts

Fire_lover.title: The Passionate Fire Lover
Fire_lover.description: Your love burns bright and warm. You love with full intensity, spontaneous affection, and the power to make your partner feel like the center of the universe.
Fire_lover.best_match: Another fire lover or air sign who fans your flames
Fire_lover.watch_out: Intensity without patience can overwhelm partners who need steadiness

Earth_lover.title: The Devoted Earth Lover
Earth_lover.description: You love through action, consistency, and the patient building of something real. Your love is a shelter — reliable, sensory-rich, and built to last.
Earth_lover.best_match: Water or earth lovers who value depth over drama
Earth_lover.watch_out: Make sure your steady love is also verbally expressed

Air_lover.title: The Intellectual Air Lover
Air_lover.description: Your love is a conversation that never gets boring. You connect through ideas, humor, and the electric meeting of minds. You need a partner who can keep up.
Air_lover.best_match: Other air lovers or fire types who inspire your mind
Air_lover.watch_out: Love lives in the body and heart too — don't escape into intellect when things get emotionally intense

Water_lover.title: The Soulful Water Lover
Water_lover.description: Your love is oceanic — deep, feeling, and transformative. You love with every cell and crave the kind of emotional intimacy that changes both people.
Water_lover.best_match: Earth lovers who provide security, or water lovers who match your depth
Water_lover.watch_out: Protect your heart without closing it — boundaries and openness can coexist

tests.title: What Is Your Spirit Animal?
tests.description: Ancient cultures believed each person is guided by an animal spirit. Discover yours through 12 revealing questions.

questions.text: In a crisis, you are the person who:

options.text: Takes charge and protects others immediately
Observes calmly and finds the strategic path
Supports and comforts everyone around you
Finds a creative, unexpected solution

questions.text: Your natural habitat would be:

options.text: High mountains or wide open skies
Deep forests or ancient wilderness
The ocean, rivers, or near water
Wherever people are — cities, villages, community

questions.text: Others see you as:

options.text: Powerful and a natural authority
Wise and mysteriously insightful
Playful and joyful
Gentle and deeply kind

questions.text: Your greatest strength is:

options.text: Seeing what's coming before anyone else
Your loyalty and devotion to your pack
Your ability to adapt and transform
Your joy and ability to connect with others

questions.text: When you need to recharge, you:

options.text: Disappear into solitude in nature
Rise above — long walks, hiking, gaining perspective
Surround yourself with your closest people
Create or transform something

questions.text: Your shadow side is:

options.text: Arrogance or the need to dominate
Isolation, retreat, or shutting others out
Trickery or misdirection when threatened
Over-sensitivity or getting swept up in others' emotions

questions.text: Your life philosophy is closest to:

options.text: See clearly, act decisively, fly high
Protect what matters, rest deeply, know your strength
Play, connect, and find joy in every wave
Transform, shed what's old, emerge new

questions.text: In relationships, you are:

options.text: Fiercely protective and intensely loyal
A guide and teacher who offers wisdom
Playful, joyful, and deeply connecting
Gentle, empathetic, and spiritually attuned

questions.text: Which word resonates most deeply with you?

options.text: Freedom
Transformation
Wisdom
Joy

questions.text: Your intuition is:

options.text: Sharp and precise — you see exactly what's true
Deep and oceanic — you feel into things
Quick and clever — pattern recognition at lightning speed
Ancient and instinctive — primal knowing

questions.text: The element you feel most connected to:

options.text: Air — wind, sky, and freedom
Earth — soil, forest, and roots
Water — ocean, rivers, and depth
Fire — transformation, light, and power

questions.text: Your message to the world is:

options.text: See from above — rise above the small and see the grand
Go deep — the real treasure is in the depths
Play and connect — life is meant to be joyful
Transform — shed what's old and become who you truly are

Eagle.title: Eagle — The Visionary
Eagle.description: Your spirit soars. The Eagle sees the big picture from great heights and acts with precision and power. You are a natural leader with exceptional vision and the courage to pursue what others cannot even see.
Eagle.message: Trust your sight. You see what others cannot — lead with that vision.

Wolf.title: Wolf — The Pack Leader
Wolf.description: Your spirit is fierce, loyal, and free. The Wolf understands both independence and community — you know when to hunt alone and when the pack is everything.
Wolf.message: Your people need you. Lead your pack with heart and instinct.

Bear.title: Bear — The Gentle Warrior
Bear.description: Your spirit is ancient, grounded, and powerful. The Bear knows the sacred rhythm of activity and deep rest — courage and tenderness in one magnificent being.
Bear.message: Rest is not weakness — it is how you gather the power to protect and create.

Owl.title: Owl — The Wise Seer
Owl.description: Your spirit sees in the dark. The Owl perceives what is hidden, speaks truth, and carries the weight of genuine wisdom with grace.
Owl.message: You see the truth. Speak it with compassion — the world needs your clear sight.

Dolphin.title: Dolphin — The Joyful Guide
Dolphin.description: Your spirit is pure delight. The Dolphin moves through life with intelligence, play, and the profound ability to guide others through emotional waters with joy.
Dolphin.message: Joy is not frivolous — it is your medicine and your gift to the world.

Fox.title: Fox — The Clever Trickster
Fox.description: Your spirit is swift and strategic. The Fox navigates complexity with intelligence, adaptability, and a playful wit that sees solutions others miss.
Fox.message: Your cleverness serves — use it for the good of all, not just your own survival.

Snake.title: Snake — The Transformer
Snake.description: Your spirit knows how to shed the old skin. The Snake carries ancient wisdom, primal energy, and the power of perpetual renewal.
Snake.message: You are not who you were — embrace the extraordinary power of your own metamorphosis.

Butterfly.title: Butterfly — The Beautiful Transformer
Butterfly.description: Your spirit embodies metamorphosis. The Butterfly emerges from the chrysalis of every hardship more beautiful, more fully yourself, and more free.
Butterfly.message: Every ending is a chrysalis. Trust the process — what is coming is more beautiful than what was.

Deer.title: Deer — The Gentle Healer
Deer.description: Your spirit is pure grace. The Deer moves gently, sees deeply, and brings healing simply by being present with open heart and soft eyes.
Deer.message: Your gentleness is strength — the world is transformed by those who choose kindness.

Whale.title: Whale — The Ancient Sage
Whale.description: Your spirit carries the wisdom of ages. The Whale holds the memory of the deep — vast intelligence, profound empathy, and connection to the collective unconscious.
Whale.message: You carry wisdom that spans generations — sing your truth into the deep waters of the world.

Lion.title: Lion — The Sovereign
Lion.description: Your spirit rules with heart. The Lion's authority comes not from force but from the genuine presence, generous spirit, and commanding warmth of a true sovereign.
Lion.message: True sovereignty is service — lead from your heart and your pride will follow.

Crow.title: Crow — The Mystic Messenger
Crow.description: Your spirit bridges worlds. The Crow navigates between the seen and unseen, the ordinary and magical — a trickster who reveals hidden truth with dark humor and sharp intelligence.
Crow.message: You see the cracks where magic seeps through — trust the messages arriving from unexpected places.

tests.title: What Is Your Dominant Energy Type?
tests.description: Are you Solar, Lunar, or a balance of both? Discover the cosmic energy that drives your personality in 10 questions.

questions.text: You feel most energized:

options.text: In the daytime, with people, making things happen
At night, in reflection, or in intimate settings
It varies with your cycle — sometimes one, sometimes the other

questions.text: Your goals are primarily:

options.text: External — achievement, recognition, impact on the world
Internal — emotional depth, spiritual growth, understanding
Both — you need outer achievement and inner richness

questions.text: People most often come to you for:

options.text: Leadership, advice, and decisive guidance
Emotional support, listening, and deep presence
Both equally — you offer wisdom and warmth

questions.text: Your greatest natural gift is:

options.text: The ability to inspire and lead by your presence and vision
Empathy so deep you feel others' experiences as your own
Bridging the rational and intuitive in unique ways

questions.text: When things go wrong, you tend to:

options.text: Take decisive action to fix the situation
Process deeply, feel fully, then emerge with understanding
Blend action with reflection depending on the situation

questions.text: Your relationship with the moon is:

options.text: You don't pay much attention to it
You feel its phases in your body and emotions distinctly
You appreciate it but aren't ruled by it

questions.text: Your creative process is:

options.text: Disciplined, structured, and productive
Intuitive, flowing, and emotionally driven
Cycles of structured work and intuitive flow

questions.text: The season you love most:

options.text: Summer — long days, warmth, vitality
Winter or autumn — depth, introspection, beauty in shadow
Spring or the transitions between seasons

questions.text: Your power is most visible:

options.text: In public — leading, speaking, creating impact
In private — healing, listening, transforming through presence
In both — you shift between public power and private depth

questions.text: The spiritual practice that calls to you:

options.text: Yoga, martial arts, breathwork — active practices
Meditation, dreamwork, journaling — receptive practices
A blend of both, depending on your cycle

Solar.title: Solar Being — The Light Bringer
Solar.description: You radiate. Your energy moves outward — inspiring, creating, leading, and bringing warmth to everyone around you. The Sun is your celestial mirror: bright, constant, life-giving.
Solar.superpower: The ability to illuminate and energize through your presence
Solar.practice: Honor your lunar side through journaling, rest, and introspective practices to complement your natural solar fire.

Lunar.title: Lunar Being — The Deep Feeler
Lunar.description: You go where the light doesn't reach. Your power lives in depth, feeling, intuition, and the ability to hold space for the full emotional spectrum of human experience.
Lunar.superpower: The capacity for emotional depth, psychic sensitivity, and transformative empathy
Lunar.practice: Honor your solar side by taking bold outer action and sharing your gifts with the world — the world needs what you know.

Balance.title: Celestial Balance — The Whole Being
Balance.description: You dance between sun and moon. You move naturally between outer action and inner receptivity, between leading and listening, between light and depth. This is a rare and powerful gift.
Balance.superpower: The ability to meet people wherever they are — in action or in stillness
Balance.practice: Honor your natural cycles rather than forcing consistency — your rhythm of action and reflection is your power, not your limitation.

tests.title: Which Planet Rules Your Life?
tests.description: In astrology, each planet carries a unique archetype. Which cosmic body most powerfully shapes your destiny? Find out in 12 questions.

questions.text: What drives you most powerfully?

options.text: The need to act, compete, and pioneer
The desire for beauty, harmony, and love
The hunger for knowledge and meaning
The call to transform and claim power

questions.text: Your relationship with rules and authority:

options.text: You resist authority and forge your own way
You respect structure and build within it
You bend rules when necessary for a greater good
You understand rules intellectually but follow your logic

questions.text: People see you as someone who:

options.text: Radiates warmth, beauty, and magnetic appeal
Has depth, mystery, and hidden power
Is brilliant, quick, and endlessly communicative
Is expansive, philosophical, and inspiring

questions.text: Your greatest challenge in life is:

options.text: Controlling impulsiveness and finding patience
Building solid foundations and avoiding fantasy
Managing intensity and releasing the need to control
Embracing limitation and accepting mortality

questions.text: The area of life that feels most significant:

options.text: Career, status, and long-term ambition
Love, relationships, and the art of connection
Travel, philosophy, and expanding your worldview
Power, transformation, and the mystery of existence

questions.text: Your mind works by:

options.text: Rapid connections — you think faster than you speak
Deep diving — you go to the bottom of every question
Expansive association — one idea leads to a thousand more
Intuitive knowing — you sense before you think

questions.text: Your natural creativity expresses through:

options.text: Beauty — art, aesthetics, design, and music
Ideas — writing, analysis, and intellectual construction
Vision — inspiring others toward a greater future
Transformation — healing, depth, and revealing the hidden

questions.text: Your motto might be:

options.text: Do it now, ask forgiveness later
Build it to last — slow and certain wins
More, bigger, better — expansion is the point
Revolutionize everything — the status quo is the enemy

questions.text: Your relationship with the past:

options.text: The past is the past — you live fully in the present
You carry the past like a teacher — it shapes everything
The past is a mystery to decode for future power
The past was another dream — the future is all that matters

questions.text: Your ideal life would involve:

options.text: A beautiful home, love, abundance, and sensory richness
Constant adventure, philosophical exploration, and freedom
Mastery, legacy, and having built something enduring
Revolutionizing something that has never been done before

questions.text: Your spiritual relationship is with:

options.text: The cosmos as logic — everything has order and meaning
The divine as beauty and love — a loving creative force
The sacred as mystery — depth, darkness, and rebirth
The universe as possibility — boundless and ever-expanding

questions.text: The legacy you want to leave:

options.text: That you loved beautifully and created lasting beauty
That you built something lasting that outlived you
That you transformed the world through your unique vision
That you expanded what was possible for everyone

Venus.title: Venus Rules You — The Lover and Creator
Venus.description: Beauty is your native language. Venus fills your life with an instinct for harmony, love, and aesthetic creation that makes everything you touch more beautiful.
Venus.archetype: The Lover, The Artist, The Harmonizer
Venus.gift: The ability to create beauty and connection wherever you go
Venus.challenge: Avoiding conflict when truth requires it
Venus.mantra: I create beauty from the inside out.

Mars.title: Mars Rules You — The Warrior Pioneer
Mars.description: You act. Mars fills your life with primal drive, competitive fire, and the courage to initiate — you were born to cut through obstacles and forge new paths.
Mars.archetype: The Warrior, The Pioneer, The Athlete
Mars.gift: Courage, decisive action, and the ability to start things others only imagine
Mars.challenge: Patience, and channeling fire without burning what you love
Mars.mantra: I act from courage, not fear.

Jupiter.title: Jupiter Rules You — The Philosopher King
Jupiter.description: More. Bigger. Wiser. Jupiter fills your life with expansion, philosophical hunger, generosity, and the belief that the universe is fundamentally abundant.
Jupiter.archetype: The Philosopher, The Teacher, The Adventurer
Jupiter.gift: Optimism, wisdom, and the ability to inspire others to expand their vision
Jupiter.challenge: Knowing when enough is truly enough
Jupiter.mantra: I expand toward the highest and best in all things.

Saturn.title: Saturn Rules You — The Master Builder
Saturn.description: You build what lasts. Saturn fills your life with discipline, strategic vision, and the long-term thinking that constructs true mastery and legacy.
Saturn.archetype: The Master, The Elder, The Builder
Saturn.gift: Discipline, wisdom through experience, and the ability to manifest in physical reality
Saturn.challenge: Learning that joy and rest are also worthy of your commitment
Saturn.mantra: I build with time as my ally.

Mercury.title: Mercury Rules You — The Messenger Mind
Mercury.description: Your mind is a marvel. Mercury fills your life with rapid connections, communication gifts, and a curiosity that can never be fully satisfied.
Mercury.archetype: The Communicator, The Trickster, The Teacher
Mercury.gift: Adaptability, communication, and the ability to connect disparate ideas
Mercury.challenge: Depth over breadth — commitment over endless exploration
Mercury.mantra: I communicate truth with clarity and elegance.

Moon.title: The Moon Rules You — The Emotional Alchemist
Moon.description: You feel everything. The Moon fills your life with emotional depth, intuitive wisdom, and the capacity to nurture and be nurtured at the deepest level.
Moon.archetype: The Nurturer, The Intuitive, The Dreamer
Moon.gift: Emotional intelligence, memory, and the capacity to hold space for the full human experience
Moon.challenge: Establishing boundaries and not absorbing others' emotions as your own
Moon.mantra: I honor the tides within me.

Pluto.title: Pluto Rules You — The Transformer
Pluto.description: You are drawn to the depths where truth lives. Pluto fills your life with intensity, psychological power, and the relentless drive toward transformation and truth.
Pluto.archetype: The Transformer, The Detective, The Phoenix
Pluto.gift: Psychological insight, the ability to facilitate transformation, and extraordinary regenerative power
Pluto.challenge: Trust, vulnerability, and releasing the need for total control
Pluto.mantra: I transform everything I touch, including myself.

Uranus.title: Uranus Rules You — The Revolutionary
Uranus.description: You are here to change things. Uranus fills your life with radical originality, humanitarian vision, and the irresistible drive to revolutionize anything that has grown stale or unjust.
Uranus.archetype: The Revolutionary, The Genius, The Rebel
Uranus.gift: Innovation, originality, and the ability to see the future from the present
Uranus.challenge: Working within systems long enough to change them
Uranus.mantra: I am the change the future needs.

Neptune.title: Neptune Rules You — The Mystic Dreamer
Neptune.description: You live at the threshold between worlds. Neptune fills your life with imagination, spiritual sensitivity, and the ability to dissolve boundaries in service of transcendent love and vision.
Neptune.archetype: The Mystic, The Artist, The Visionary
Neptune.gift: Imagination, empathy, spiritual sensitivity, and creative vision
Neptune.challenge: Grounding your visions in practical reality
Neptune.mantra: I see through all illusions to the love beneath.

tests.title: What Past Life Archetype Do You Carry?
tests.description: Astrologers believe we carry imprints from past lives. Which ancient archetype shapes who you are today?

questions.text: You have always had an inexplicable affinity for:

options.text: Ancient civilizations — Egypt, Greece, Rome
Mystical traditions — alchemy, shamanism, magic
Royalty and nobility — courts, castles, refinement
Common people — healers, farmers, village life

questions.text: You feel drawn to a specific role in groups:

options.text: Leader — the one who decides and directs
Healer or counselor — the one who tends to others
Teacher or sage — the one who holds knowledge
Mystic or visionary — the one who sees beyond

questions.text: A recurring theme in your dreams or imagination:

options.text: Battle, conflict, or fierce protection of something sacred
Temples, rituals, and sacred ceremonies
Libraries, manuscripts, and ancient texts
Healing spaces — herb gardens, sacred waters, medicine

questions.text: Your relationship with power:

options.text: You seek it actively — power enables your vision
You hold power reluctantly — preferring wisdom to authority
Power comes from the unseen — spiritual authority matters more
Power should serve — you use it for others' benefit

questions.text: Your soul feels oldest around:

options.text: Ancient sacred sites — Stonehenge, the pyramids, Machu Picchu
Old libraries, monasteries, universities
Battlefields and places of historical conflict
Healing places — hot springs, forests, sanctuaries

questions.text: Your karmic lesson seems to be:

options.text: Learning that strength serves love, not dominance
Bringing ancient wisdom into practical daily life
Healing your own wounds before healing others
Trusting the spiritual dimension over the material

Warrior.title: The Ancient Warrior
Warrior.description: You carry the soul of a warrior — not a destroyer but a protector. In past lives, your courage and strength defended what was sacred.
Warrior.soul_wound: The trauma of conflict and the weight of decisions made in crisis
Warrior.current_mission: Transform warrior energy into the protection of love, truth, and the vulnerable.

Healer.title: The Ancient Healer
Healer.description: You carry the soul of a healer — medicine woman, village midwife, temple physician. Healing flows naturally through your hands and presence.
Healer.soul_gift: The ability to sense and address suffering
Healer.soul_wound: Burnout from giving without receiving, martyrdom
Healer.current_mission: Heal yourself first and establish boundaries that let your gift flow sustainably.

Scholar.title: The Ancient Scholar
Scholar.description: You carry the soul of a scholar — library guardian, monastic scribe, Pythagorean initiate. Knowledge is your native element.
Scholar.soul_gift: The love of truth and the ability to organize and transmit knowledge
Scholar.soul_wound: Isolation, the ivory tower, knowledge held without application
Scholar.current_mission: Bring your knowledge into the world — wisdom shared is wisdom multiplied.

Mystic.title: The Ancient Mystic
Mystic.description: You carry the soul of a mystic — oracle, shaman, alchemist, seer. You have walked between worlds and carry that liminal awareness.
Mystic.past_theme: Vision, prophecy, spiritual service, the hidden arts
Mystic.soul_gift: Access to dimensions of reality beyond ordinary awareness
Mystic.soul_wound: Isolation, being misunderstood, persecution for your gifts
Mystic.current_mission: Bring your mystical gifts into grounded, loving service — the world needs mystics who can be with ordinary life.

Priest.title: The Ancient Priest or Priestess
Priest.description: You carry the soul of a sacred servant — high priest, temple keeper, oracle. You have served the divine and held sacred space for communities.
Priest.past_theme: Ceremony, sacred service, bridging human and divine
Priest.soul_gift: The ability to hold sacred space and facilitate spiritual experience for others
Priest.soul_wound: Rigid doctrine, loss of faith, carrying others' spiritual weight
Priest.current_mission: Serve the sacred through authentic living, not through role or institution alone.

Royalty.title: The Ancient Royalty
Royalty.description: You carry the soul of a sovereign — queen, chieftain, noble leader. Leadership is in your bones; authority comes naturally.
Royalty.soul_gift: Natural authority, vision, and the ability to organize and lead
Royalty.soul_wound: Abuse of power, isolation of leadership, the loneliness of the throne
Royalty.current_mission: Lead with genuine service — your authority is earned through love and wisdom, not position.

tests.title: Which Chakra Needs Your Attention?
tests.description: The 7 chakras are energy centers that shape every aspect of your life. Which one is calling for your love right now?

questions.text: The area of life feeling most challenging right now:

options.text: Feeling safe, grounded, and financially secure
Relationships, pleasure, and creative expression
Confidence, will, and following through
Love, grief, and heart connection

questions.text: You often feel:

options.text: Anxious, ungrounded, or financially worried
Creatively blocked or emotionally numb
Lacking confidence or unable to follow through
Unable to say what you really mean

questions.text: Your most pressing inner work involves:

options.text: Trusting that you are safe and supported
Opening your heart after loss or disappointment
Speaking your truth without fear
Developing your intuition and inner sight

questions.text: The physical symptom you experience most:

options.text: Lower back pain, knee issues, or fatigue
Hip or lower abdomen tension, reproductive concerns
Stomach issues, digestive problems, or anxiety
Throat tightness, voice issues, or neck tension

questions.text: What do you most need more of?

options.text: Stability and the feeling that everything will be okay
Creative flow, pleasure, and sensory aliveness
Confidence and the power to follow through
Clarity, vision, and spiritual connection

questions.text: Your relationship with your own voice:

options.text: You often hold back what you really want to say
You speak freely but lack depth in your words
You struggle with being truly heard
Your voice feels connected to something greater

Root.title: Root Chakra (Muladhara) — Your Foundation Calls
Root.description: Your Root Chakra is calling for attention. This energy center governs safety, security, physical needs, and your sense of belonging in the world. When it's imbalanced, life feels unstable or threatening.
healing_practices: Yoga poses: Mountain Pose, Warrior I, Child's Pose
Root.affirmation: I am safe. I am grounded. I have everything I need.

Sacral.title: Sacral Chakra (Svadhisthana) — Your Creativity Calls
Sacral.description: Your Sacral Chakra is asking to be freed. This center governs creativity, pleasure, emotion, sensuality, and the joy of being embodied. It is the wellspring of all creative life.
healing_practices: Orange foods — mangoes, oranges, sweet potatoes
Sacral.affirmation: I feel. I create. I embrace the sweetness of life.

Solar_Plexus.title: Solar Plexus Chakra (Manipura) — Your Power Calls
Solar_Plexus.description: Your Solar Plexus Chakra is activating. This center governs personal power, will, confidence, and your ability to take action in alignment with your deepest truth.
Solar_Plexus.affirmation: I am powerful. I act with clarity and confidence.

Heart.title: Heart Chakra (Anahata) — Your Love Calls
Heart.description: Your Heart Chakra is expanding or healing. This center governs love, compassion, grief, forgiveness, and the ability to give and receive fully.
healing_practices: Green foods — leafy greens, avocado, green vegetables
Heart.affirmation: I am loved. I give love freely and receive it gratefully.

Throat.title: Throat Chakra (Vishuddha) — Your Voice Calls
Throat.description: Your Throat Chakra is asking you to speak. This center governs authentic expression, truth-telling, and the sacred power of your voice.
healing_practices: Writing what you need to say
Throat.affirmation: I speak my truth with clarity and love.

Third_Eye.title: Third Eye Chakra (Ajna) — Your Vision Calls
Third_Eye.description: Your Third Eye Chakra is opening. This center governs intuition, inner vision, wisdom, and the ability to see beyond surface appearances.
healing_practices: Time in darkness or with eyes closed
Third_Eye.affirmation: I see clearly. I trust my inner knowing.

Crown.title: Crown Chakra (Sahasrara) — Your Spirit Calls
Crown.description: Your Crown Chakra is calling you higher. This center governs spiritual connection, enlightenment, and your relationship with something greater than yourself.
healing_practices: Time in nature under the open sky
Crown.affirmation: I am connected to all that is. I am one with the divine.

tests.title: What Is Your Manifestation Style?
tests.description: Everyone manifests differently. Discover whether you manifest through fire, earth, air, or water energy — and how to work with your natural style.

questions.text: When you want something, you:

options.text: Act immediately — momentum creates manifestation
Plan carefully and work systematically toward it
Visualize, affirm, and use mental power
Feel it completely as if already real

questions.text: Your biggest manifestation block is:

options.text: Impatience — wanting results before they are ready
Rigidity — following plans too strictly to allow flow
Overthinking instead of feeling your desires into form
Doubt or emotional interference blocking your signal

questions.text: Manifestation works best for you when:

options.text: You commit fully and let enthusiasm carry you
You show up consistently and do the practical work
Your intentions are crystal clear and frequently stated
You get emotionally aligned with the feeling of having it

questions.text: Your natural affinity is with:

options.text: Vision boards, affirmations, and spoken word
Journaling, scripting, and written intentions
Feeling meditations and emotional visualization
Taking bold action inspired by a clear vision

questions.text: You believe manifestation happens through:

options.text: Bold action aligned with inspired vision
Disciplined, consistent effort over time
The clarity and frequency of your thoughts and words
Emotional alignment and feeling it first

Fire_Manifestor.title: Fire Manifestor — The Bold Creator
Fire_Manifestor.description: You manifest through inspired action and bold commitment. Your fire creates momentum — the universe responds to your enthusiasm and decisive moves.
Fire_Manifestor.key_practice: Take one bold, decisive action toward your desire each day — fire needs to burn to stay alive.
Fire_Manifestor.power_phrase: I act boldly and the universe meets my action.
Fire_Manifestor.shadow_work: Practice surrender — not everything needs to be forced into existence.

Earth_Manifestor.title: Earth Manifestor — The Patient Builder
Earth_Manifestor.description: You manifest through consistent, practical effort and the patient construction of solid foundations. What you build is real, lasting, and tangible.
Earth_Manifestor.key_practice: Create a concrete plan with clear milestones and show up for it every single day.
Earth_Manifestor.power_phrase: I build consistently and my desires take solid form.
Earth_Manifestor.shadow_work: Open to receiving what arrives unexpectedly — manifestation also comes through flow, not only effort.

Air_Manifestor.title: Air Manifestor — The Visionary Thinker
Air_Manifestor.description: You manifest through the power of thought, clarity of intention, and the magnetic force of clearly articulated desire. Words and ideas are your spells.
Air_Manifestor.key_practice: Write, speak, and visualize your intentions with extraordinary clarity — get specific with the universe.
Air_Manifestor.power_phrase: My thoughts are spells. I think and speak into being.
Air_Manifestor.shadow_work: Take your ideas into embodied action — manifestation completes itself in the physical world.

Water_Manifestor.title: Water Manifestor — The Emotional Alchemist
Water_Manifestor.description: You manifest through emotional alignment and the felt sense of already having what you desire. Your feelings are your most powerful creative force.
Water_Manifestor.key_practice: Spend time each day fully inhabiting the emotional state of having your desire — feel it in your body.
Water_Manifestor.power_phrase: What I feel deeply, I draw powerfully into my life.
Water_Manifestor.shadow_work: Clear limiting emotions rather than amplifying them — emotional mastery is the key to your power.

tests.title: What Is Your Cosmic Attachment Style?
tests.description: Attachment styles shape every relationship. Discover yours through the lens of astrology in these 10 revealing questions.

questions.text: When someone you care about doesn't respond quickly, you:

options.text: Notice it but aren't particularly worried
Immediately wonder if they're pulling away
Appreciate the space and use it for yourself
Feel both concerned and pull back simultaneously

questions.text: In romantic relationships, your greatest fear is:

options.text: I don't have a dominant fear — I trust love will work out
Being abandoned or replaced
Losing my independence or being consumed
Both connection and separation feel threatening

questions.text: When a relationship starts getting serious, you:

options.text: Feel excited and ready to deepen the connection
Become either clingy or overly giving to secure them
Start finding reasons to maintain more distance
Push them away even as you desperately want closeness

questions.text: Your inner narrative about love is:

options.text: Love is safe and I am worthy of being loved well
I love deeply but worry I'm never quite enough
Love is wonderful but I function better with significant space
I want closeness but it terrifies me on some level

questions.text: After conflict with a partner, you typically:

options.text: Talk it through calmly and repair the connection
Seek reassurance urgently and fear the relationship is ending
Need significant space before you can return to connection
Oscillate between wanting closeness and wanting distance

questions.text: Your childhood relationship with your primary caregiver was:

options.text: Consistently loving and emotionally available
Inconsistent — sometimes warm, sometimes distant
Often emotionally unavailable or dismissive of feelings
Frightening, unpredictable, or traumatic at times

questions.text: In relationships, you tend to:

options.text: Give and receive love with relatively equal ease
Give more than you receive, trying to earn love
Give love with space and independence intact
Feel torn between merging and disappearing

Secure.title: Secure Attachment — The Loving Anchor
Secure.description: You love from a place of security and trust. Secure attachment means you believe in love's reliability and your own worthiness — a gift that makes you a healing presence in relationships.
Secure.zodiac_archetype: Taurus or Libra energy — grounded in love's constancy
Secure.growth_edge: Continue modeling secure love for others — and stay aware that secure doesn't mean complacent.
Secure.healing_practice: Maintain secure attachment through regular check-ins with your partner and your own emotional state.

Anxious.title: Anxious Attachment — The Deep Feeler Seeking Safety
Anxious.description: You love with extraordinary depth and intensity, but your nervous system has learned to watch for signs of abandonment. Your love is real — your task is learning that love is safe.
Anxious.zodiac_archetype: Cancer or Scorpio energy — deep love searching for security
Anxious.growth_edge: Develop your own secure inner relationship so that love becomes abundant, not scarce.
Anxious.healing_practice: Inner child work, self-soothing practices, and learning to self-regulate before seeking reassurance.

Avoidant.title: Avoidant Attachment — The Sovereign Seeker
Avoidant.description: You value love and need connection, but your nervous system has learned that closeness comes at a cost. Your task is discovering that intimacy and freedom can coexist.
Avoidant.zodiac_archetype: Aquarius or Capricorn energy — independence protecting a tender heart
Avoidant.growth_edge: Practice letting people in — vulnerability is not weakness but the gateway to genuine love.
Avoidant.healing_practice: Gradually increasing tolerance for emotional closeness and vulnerability in safe relationships.

Disorganized.title: Disorganized Attachment — The Brave Paradox
Disorganized.description: You carry the most complex attachment pattern — you desperately want love and simultaneously fear it. This often develops from early experiences where love and fear were mixed. You are brave beyond measure to keep showing up for love.
Disorganized.zodiac_archetype: Scorpio or Pisces energy — profound depth navigating early wounds
Disorganized.growth_edge: Healing is possible and available — trauma-informed therapy can transform disorganized patterns.
Disorganized.healing_practice: Trauma-informed therapy (EMDR, somatic work), safe and boundaried relationships, and profound self-compassion.

tests.title: What Is Your Cosmic Purpose?
tests.description: Every person arrives with a unique mission. These 12 questions reveal the cosmic purpose encoded in your soul's design.

questions.text: When you are most alive, you are:

options.text: Creating — making something that didn't exist before
Connecting — in meaningful relationship with others
Understanding — pursuing depth of knowledge or truth
Transforming — facilitating change in yourself or others

questions.text: If money were not a consideration, you would spend your life:

options.text: Making art, music, or beautiful things
Healing people — physically, emotionally, or spiritually
Teaching, writing, or sharing wisdom
Pioneering something that changes the world

questions.text: People often tell you that you helped them by:

options.text: Making them see or feel something new through your work
Listening in a way that made them feel truly understood
Teaching them something that changed how they see the world
Inspiring them or showing what's possible

questions.text: The social contribution you feel called to make:

options.text: Bringing beauty and meaning through creative work
Reducing suffering and increasing wellbeing
Expanding knowledge and elevating human understanding
Building systems, communities, or movements for change

questions.text: Your deepest spiritual knowing is:

options.text: Beauty is a form of the divine and creating it is sacred
Love and healing are the most important forces in existence
Truth and wisdom are what make a life worth living
Evolution and transformation are the purpose of existence

questions.text: You feel most purposeful when:

options.text: A creative project comes together exactly as you envisioned
Someone heals or grows through your presence
You illuminate a truth that shifts someone's understanding
You can see the arc of a better future and move toward it

Creator.title: The Creator — Beauty as Your Cosmic Purpose
Creator.description: You are here to make. Beauty, meaning, and the translation of inner vision into outer form — this is your sacred mission. Your creative work is not a luxury; it is your spiritual path.
Creator.soul_mission: To bring beauty, meaning, and creative vision into the world in your unique way
Creator.soul_gift: The ability to see what could be and bring it into existence
Creator.soul_challenge: Believing your creative work has value — it does, profoundly
Creator.calling: Make your art. Share your work. The world is impoverished without what only you can create.

Healer.title: The Healer — Love as Your Cosmic Purpose
Healer.description: You are here to heal. Whether through medicine, therapy, teaching, presence, or simple kindness — you reduce suffering and increase love wherever you go.
Healer.soul_mission: To facilitate healing — physical, emotional, and spiritual — in yourself and others
Healer.soul_gift: Empathy so deep it becomes medicine
Healer.soul_challenge: Healing your own wounds so you have genuine presence to offer, not just martyrdom
Healer.calling: Heal yourself with the same love you offer others. Your own wholeness is your greatest gift.

Teacher.title: The Teacher — Wisdom as Your Cosmic Purpose
Teacher.description: You are here to illuminate. Teaching is your sacred art — whether in classrooms, conversations, books, or the way you live your life publicly.
Teacher.soul_mission: To transmit knowledge, wisdom, and understanding in ways that genuinely change people
Teacher.soul_gift: The ability to make complex truths accessible and transformative
Teacher.soul_challenge: Continuing to be a student — the best teachers never stop learning
Teacher.calling: Share what you know. Your wisdom is not meant to be hoarded — it is meant to be given.

Sage.title: The Sage — Truth as Your Cosmic Purpose
Sage.description: You are here to know and to transmit knowing. The Sage pursues wisdom not for status but because truth is the most real thing — and sharing it is the most sacred act.
Sage.soul_mission: To pursue, embody, and transmit genuine wisdom
Sage.soul_gift: The love of truth and the ability to discern what is real from what is not
Sage.soul_challenge: Bringing ancient wisdom into ordinary daily application
Sage.calling: Live your truth completely — a sage who embodies their wisdom teaches more than any lecture.

Visionary.title: The Visionary — Evolution as Your Cosmic Purpose
Visionary.description: You are here to see what could be and bring it into being. Visionaries see the future from the present — and are brave enough to devote their lives to building it.
Visionary.soul_mission: To envision and catalyze a better future
Visionary.soul_gift: Seeing what others cannot yet see and believing in it fiercely enough to build it
Visionary.soul_challenge: Grounding your vision in practical steps and gathering the community to co-create it
Visionary.calling: Your vision is not a fantasy — it is your blueprint. Begin building it now.

Transformer.title: The Transformer — Metamorphosis as Your Cosmic Purpose
Transformer.description: You are here to facilitate deep change. The Transformer walks willingly into the fire of transformation and emerges as a guide for others navigating their own crucibles.
Transformer.soul_mission: To facilitate profound transformation — in yourself, in others, and in the systems that shape human life
Transformer.soul_gift: The ability to go into depth others avoid and emerge with gold
Transformer.soul_challenge: Learning that not every situation requires transformation — some things are simply to be enjoyed
Transformer.calling: Trust the transformations you have lived. They are your credentials. Use them in service of others.

Guide.title: The Guide — Companionship as Your Cosmic Purpose
Guide.description: You are here to walk with others. The Guide does not always have the answers but has the extraordinary gift of genuine presence, direction, and companionship for those who are lost.
Guide.soul_mission: To accompany others on their most important journeys
Guide.soul_gift: The ability to be genuinely present with others in their most vulnerable and important moments
Guide.soul_challenge: Trusting that your presence — not your answers — is your greatest gift
Guide.calling: You don't need to have all the answers. Show up fully and walk alongside people in the dark.
